info.name: Timetables
info.description: This collection consists of folders relating to study timetables, lecture timetables, and teaching timetables.

item.name: Study Timetable

request.description: A student or a staff official can use this endpoint to create a personal study timetable for themselves.

response.name: Create Personal Study Timetable

request.description: Students and staff can use this endpoint to retrieve their personal study timetables.
This endpoint can be used by students and staff to update their personal timetable.
A logged in student or a staff can use this endpoint to delete their personal timetable.

item.description: This folder consits of endpoints which allows students and teachers to create personal study timetables.

item.name: Lectures Timetable
Fetch All The Lecture Timetables That Belongs To A School

request.description: This endpoint can be used to see all the lecture timetables for a specific school.

response.name: Fetch All The Lecture Timetables That Belongs To A School

item.name: Fetch Lecture Timetable For A Specific Class

request.description: This endpoint can be used to fetch a lecture timetable for a specific class in a particular school.

response.name: Fetch Lecture Timetable For A Specific Class
response.body:

item.name: Update Lecture Timetable For A Specific Class

request.description: This endpoint can be used by a school administrator or form teacher to adjust the lecture timetable of a specific class.

item.name: Delete Lecture Timetable For A Class

request.description: This endpoint can be used by a school administrator or a form-teacher to delete the lecture timetable for a specific class.

item.description: This folder consists of series of endpoints which can be used by schools to create lecture timetables for classes.

request.description: Returns the timetables of every staff in a school
Deletes teacher timetable of a staff
Creates a timetable for a staff of a specific school
Retrieves timetable of a specific teacher
Update teacher timetable for a specific staff
